price: 86. Kuwaasi waa kuwa gatay nolosha adduunkan halkii Aakhirada, sidaas awgeed cadaabka lagama khafiifiyo loomana gargaaro.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā bil-ākhirati falā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunṣarūna
